content: --अंबर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} having only the directions for his clothing, stark naked, unclothed; दिगंबरत्वेन निवेदितं वसु <ls>Ku. 5. 72.</ls> (--रः {1} a naked mendicant (of the Jaina or Buddha sect.). {2} a mendicant, an ascetic. {3} an epithet of ({@--1@}) Śiva; ({@--2@}) Skanda. {4} darkness. (--री an epithet of Durgā.
